title: The Book of the Flower Fairies
description: Green cloth covers with gilt decoration and lettering. Green dyed top page edge. No date in the book. Ca. 1928. Tattered Dj has been laminated to hold it together. This volume includes Spring, Summer and Autumn. Price on lower corner of front flap 5/-Net. Filled with full page color illustrations of the poems. Illustrated by the author. 7.5x5.5 with 92 pp.
author: Cicely Mary Barker
